original_title: Stevie Nicks: Through the Looking Glass
overview: Featuring rare footage, archive and interviews, this documentary takes a look at one of the most iconic figures in rock n roll, the story of Stevie Nicks. The ups, downs, and personal sacrifices she has made for her musical career. She has been responsible for composing some of the most joyful and celebrated songs ever written.
title: Stevie Nicks: Through the Looking Glass
